title: EntityChoices
description: The player must choose a subset of entities within the provided set. The player can also prefer to make an empty choice

choice_type.description: Kind of choice the player must make

sourceID.description: Entity which has triggered this action

hide_chosen.description: If the chosen entities will be put into the SETASIDE zone

count_min.description: Minimum amount of entities the player must choose; 0 for MULLIGAN choicetype

count_max.description: Maximum amount of entities the player must choose; 3/4 for MULLIGAN choicetype

entities.description: Set of entities, which is the superset of the player's choice set
